app_does_what: this app guides you step-by-step through your umra mufradah.
note_for_makkah_reisdents: NOTE: This app is not for those who live in makkah or its suburbs
read_terms_and_conditions: i have read and understood the terms and conditions
non_baligh_accompanying_text: is there is a non baligh person accompanying you whom you want to perform umrah as well
mumayyiz_def: mumayyiz is one who has a sense of right and wrong. Non mumayyiz is one who does not yet have a sense of right and wrong
